about_the_game:
In a parallel timeline, Vietnam veterans unknowingly brought a virus back to their countries. Several years later, this virus began affecting some people, turning them into semi-intelligent zombies. The government confined them to quarantine zones. Max Cobra, a former Vietnam veteran, was lucky enough not to be affected by the virus, but he needed to make money. He turned this disaster into an opportunity. While cleaning zombies in different quarantine zones, he illegally turned these actions into a local TV show. He found some sponsors and teammates to support him. The show became so popular that it still breaks viewing records on VHS tapes.

GAMEPLAY AND FEATURES

Test your strategic thinking and quick reflexes to survive against zombie hordes. Key gameplay features:

Wheelchair: Max is a war veteran and uses a wheelchair. This has turned into an advantage for him. With certain upgrades, he can move faster than anyone. He can even fly!

Illegal TV Show Atmosphere: To make money, Max Cobra goes to various quarantine zones in the country and clears zombies. This provides an exciting live broadcast experience for viewers.


Live broadcast, interactive viewers, TV Rating system: The live TV system set up in the game shows the current status of the broadcast. As the rating increases, TV commercials increase as well. This translates into money for you.

Dynamic wave system: The game aims to keep the TV show lively and dynamic continuously based on parameters like the difficulty level you choose, your game performance, and the duration.


Various weapons and upgrades: Upgrades generally enhance the fun of the game as they allow you to stay in the game longer and change the balance of dynamic difficulty. For instance: At the start of the game, your shots will be inconsistent because your weapon and wheelchair need upgrades. Get the Wheelchair brake and Better grip upgrades.


Teammates: If you get the necessary upgrades in the game, you can call teammates!. They will help you with their unique abilities both when they arrive with truck and while they are on the scene.


Zombie Cleaner: At the end of each wave, it cleans up the remaining zombies on the screen. It is a gift from the channel broadcasting your TV show.


Zombie Bus: When there aren’t enough zombies on the screen at a certain difficulty level, Mr. Triumph’s gift(!), the Zombie Bus, arrives and drops zombies at certain points. This increases your ratings but makes your job a bit harder.

Fatal Fury: A well-known energy drink’s content has been specially modified for you. When you use it, you can move faster than anyone. More precisely, everything except you slows down to a quarter of its speed. Purchase the Fatal Fury upgrade to use it. The higher the level you buy, the faster the Fatal Fury Bar fills, allowing you to use it more frequently.


Steam achievements based on difficulty level: You will get very few Steam achievements in the easiest mode, 'Walker,' while you can unlock all achievements in the highest difficulty level, 'Nightmare.'

ROADMAP

Prioritized:

- More in-game TV advert animations
- Improvements in dynamic difficulty levels (Player feedback will be taken)
- Balancing upgrade prices (Player feedback will be taken)
- Adjusting wave durations and numbers (Player feedback will be taken)
- AI improvements for teammates to make more logical decisions and be more helpful
- Zone 2: Completely new background and new types of zombies
- Trip section: When a new zone is opened, all your credits are reset. But there's a chance to earn enough credits at the start by playing the Trip stage. In the Trip stage, you will crush zombies with your truck.
- New upgrades for each new zone
- Turkish and German language support (Text only)

highlighted.name: What kind of TV show is this?

content_descriptors.notes: This game explicitly depicts blood and zombie dismemberment in a cartoonish style. Additionally, the female characters in the game wear revealing outfits, but there is no nudity.
